attributes.additional_details:
As heart disease continues to grow and is among one of the biggest killers in the UK, the government need to ensure that people are aware of what food is causing harm and allow people to make an informed choice.

Therefore this petition is for all food packing to contain how much cholesterol is contained in the food like they do with Salt, fat, etc.

Did you know your cholesterol should be below 5 and that you should only be having an intake of 300mg of cholesterol per day.

It matters not on how overweight or underweight you are, cholesterol cannot be seen by the naked eye.

Sign this petition please to force the government to make the change that will change the health and happiness of your loved ones.
